trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>esemény után űrlap be van zárva, vagy a felhasználó a felhasználói felületen (UI) vagy programozott módon, például <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>osztályhoz, vagy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>osztály</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> a</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> metódusok keresztül történik</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy űrlapon bármely gyermek- vagy saját tulajdonú űrlapok egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>esemény is jelenik meg, mindegyikhez.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosedEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: A FormClosedEventArgs osztály biztosít az adatok a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>esemény.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>tulajdonság biztosít az űrlap bezárása miért okát.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> értékében, amely megfelel az az oka, miért érdemes az űrlap be lett zárva.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy miért érdemes az űrlap be lett zárva.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>miatt számos okból, mind a felhasználó által kezdeményezett és programozott akkor lehet lezárni.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
